title: Top Sexual Health Stories of 2007: Readers' Choice
author: Miranda Hitti

content: Secrets about marriage. Questions to ask before saying I do. Affairs, libido loss, and the leading reasons for having sex .
Those topics made the following list of the 10 most viewed sexual health stories on WebMD for 2007.
bullets: 8 Things No One Tells You About Marriage
Get the STD Picture
Small-Penis Syndrome Common
Why People Have Sex: 237 Reasons
Signs of a Codependent Relationship
Loss of Libido in Men
Why Women Lose Interest in Sex
The Affair You Don't Know You're Having
Are You Spouses or Just Roommates?
Questions to Ask Before Getting Married
